    • Method Detail

      • addProperty

        public static void addProperty​(Properties props,
                               String key,
                               String defaultValue,
                               String property,
                               String exampleValue)
        Adds a key-value pair to a Properties instance. Takes values from a given system property and overrides the default value with it.
        Parameters:
        props - The Properties instance to write to.
        key - The name of the property.
        defaultValue - The default value (for demo purposes)
        property - The name of the system property that can override the default value.
        exampleValue - An example value that is different from the default.
